import time

from vpython import *

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=0.5, color=color.blue)
arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vector(1,1,0), color=color.red)

dt = 0.01
velocity = vector(1,1,0)
acceleration = vector(0,-9.8,0)

while True:
    rate(100)
    ball.pos = ball.pos + velocity*dt
    velocity = velocity + acceleration*dt
    arrow.pos = ball.pos
